comment._content: I started a Wikipedia entry for him: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/R.A.C._Smith Robert A.C. Smith (February 22, 1857 - July 27, 1933) was the Commissioner of Docks in New York City.

comment._content: Richard Arthur Norton: thanks for pointing out R.A.C. Smith's first name.  We'll add it to the description next time we update.

comment._content: Does anyone know if " Florence Smith" is related to R A C Smith?.  Could she be a younger daughter? . According to NYTimes 1918  She was a bridesmaid to Julia Narganes,  who was daughter of  Ricardo Narganes......a wealth cuban and  close  pesonal  friend & business associate.of RACS.
